text: munde navu isra'ilara santatigalannu samudradinda parugolisidevu. Phir‌aun mattu avana padegalu dvesa hagu vidrohadondige avarannu himbalisidaru. Konege avanu mulugatodagidaga, ‘‘isra'ilara santatigalu yarannu nambiruvaro avana horatu bere devarilla endu nanu nambuttene mattu nanu muslimanagiddene’’ endanu
